channel.title: How do i make people keep their stuff when they die?
channel.description: how do i make people keep their stuff when they die? alot people recomended this on my server and i checked everyweare even google and i cant find i IF YOU CAN PLEASE SEND ME THE LINK

item.title: How do i make people keep their stuff when they die?
item.dc:creator: @joeysc4p3 joeysc4p3
item.description:
@joeysc4p3 wrote:

[quote=“gunz4life, post:2, topic:223484”]lol here i just found it out yesterday:P
go into client.java search this:

public boolean ApplyDead()

somewere thier add this:

[quote]if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true && (absX >= XXXX && absX <= XXXX && absY >= XXXX && absY <= XXXX)) {
teleportToX = XXXX;
teleportToY = XXXX;
IsDeadTeleporting = true;
frame1();
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
refreshSkills();
PoisonDelay = 9999999;
KillerId = playerId;[/quote]
i’m not sure if its a real 1 i just found it… got fix the “xxxx” you’ll figure it out or someone will probally help with the rest.[/quote]

doesnt work

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make people keep their stuff when they die?

item.title: How do i make people keep their stuff when they die?
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

lol here i just found it out yesterday:P
go into client.java search this:

public boolean ApplyDead()
somewere thier add this:
if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true && (absX >= XXXX && absX <= XXXX && absY >= XXXX && absY <= XXXX)) { teleportToX = XXXX; teleportToY = XXXX; IsDeadTeleporting = true; frame1(); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]); playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); refreshSkills(); PoisonDelay = 9999999; KillerId = playerId;
i'm not sure if its a real 1 i just found it... got fix the "xxxx" you'll figure it out or someone will probally help with the rest.

Read full topic
